feed.title: Formbricks Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.8.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: removes api package and deps by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5251
  • fix: openAPI spec for contact endpoints by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5247
  • fix: updatedAt not set in response update by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5315
  • fix: respondent should not see redirect card text by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5239
  • docs: updates the API keys docs in API reference by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5319
  • chore: upgrade typescript and react dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5317
  • fix: adds FormbricksEnvironment struct for url constants by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5312
  • chore: improve accessibility for matrix question by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5320

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.8.1...v3.8.2

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.8.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: buttonLabel conditions by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5336
  • chore: add test files to modules/account and modules/analysis by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5294

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.8.2...v3.8.3

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.8.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: missing translation in api key modal by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5341
  • fix: download responses button label by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5324
  • fix: adds api_key label to the view permission modal by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5326
  • fix: progress bar calculation by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5339
  • feat: questionid to summary by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5381
  • fix: security hotspots in Dockerfile by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5314
  • chore: make env permissions optional in api key by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5309
  • fix: type issue in notion integration by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5385
  • fix: fixes cb urls by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5392
  • fix: removes the onFinished callbacks from the iOS package by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5384
  • fix: docker build test by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5396
  • docs: tweak Data Prefilling docs for clarity by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5402
  • docs: tweak quick start guides by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5403
  • chore: add segment id to modal view by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5391
  • fix: adds eslint rules for using test and refactors the current tests by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5397
  • fix: refactor end screen card description ux by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5386
  • chore: enable performance insights for rds by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5404
  • feat: advanced follow ups by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5340
  • chore(infra): increase cloudwatch elb alarm limit to 10 by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5407
  • fix: adds no-cache header when debug mode is ON by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5405
  • fix: managers should not be allowed to create api keys by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5409
  • fix: iOS SDK memory leaks by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5388
  • fix: smaller fixes and tweaks by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5417
  • chore: removes formbricks_encryption_key-environment-variable by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5426
  • fix: Address SonarQube code smells by @vaxi87 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5416
  • fix: docker build error because of deprecated Github cache by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5428

New Contributors

  • @vijayraghav-io made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5314

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.8.3...v3.8.4

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.8.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: updates prisma to latest version by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5395
  • chore: Enable Sentry integration by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5337
  • chore: move package lib to web/lib by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5425
  • chore: update alpine version by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5465
  • fix: x button not visible when close on click outside is not allowed by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5464
  • fix: setLanguage and icon issue for the iOS SDK by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5470
  • fix: cleanup issue in iOS package by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5473
  • fix: Some DoS (usage of regex) Sonar Security Hotspots by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5334
  • chore(terraform): add valkey and rds for staging env by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5471
  • chore: fix buckets and iam for staging env by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5475
  • fix: billing by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5483
  • fix: android sdk callbacks, tweaks and fixes by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5487
  • feat: Implement v2 management api endpoint for contact attribute keys by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5316
  • chore: add js-core to SonarQube check by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5466
  • chore: update sonar properties file by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5472
  • fix: updated encryption algorithm and added sort function by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5485

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.8.4...v3.8.5

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.8.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: iOS sonarqube issues by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5494
  • fix: stop timers on logout by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5498
  • fix: SAML flow jose package import by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5497
  • fix: android sonarqube issues by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5503
  • fix: refactor clickable divs into buttons by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5489

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.8.5...v3.8.6
